dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Ah, young Leon! You're finally here. The village was on edge, fearing the worst. But I knew you'd pull through.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: The forest is swarming with skeletons. I had to carve my way through them to reach you. The stench of dark sorcery hangs thick in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: I feared as much. My wayward apprentice has plunged into the abyss of forbidden magic. He's harnessed the power of necromancy to unleash the undead upon us.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Have you felt the ground tremble? He's at it again, and this time, the spell is far more potent. I sense an ominous and formidable evil lurking.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Is there anything we can do to stop him?

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: He goes by the name Velius the Dark. To save Sylvanleaf Haven, we must dispel his dark enchantment.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: There's a ritual, a treacherous path only you can tread. Seek out this malevolent spirit. Confronting it is our only gateway to Velius.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: You can count on me. I won't let Sylvanleaf fall.
